attributes.action: ensure that Transport for London  (TfL) and the Mayor of London, Mr Ken Livingstone, cease their prevarication and publish immediately the final report on the use of  the Transport for London Road Network (TLRN) bus lanes by motorcyclists and scooter riders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is believed that the lives of 9 motorcycle and or scooter riders could be saved annually in London by Transport for London (TfL) endorsing the use of bus lanes for those modes. The hold up, for reasons best known to TfL, of the publication of a  report which may well prove the case for usage is thus totally unacceptable and should be addressed immediately
